title: BAGGIES
features: Developed a bag selling responsive website where normal users can see home & explore page. Implement login system with email/ password & Google. To log in using email user must sign up first. Only logged-in users can order products.

Logged-in users have a dashboard where users can manage their orders, give reviews & pay for their orders. An admin can add a product, manage products, make an admin, manage all orders & change order status.
The technology used: React, material UI, firebase, react-router, node, express, MongoDB, etc.

title: TravelCove
features: Build a single-page traveling application where users can see many tour packages for different places. Before exploring for a package users need to log in with email/ password or google.
Registered users can log in with an email/ password. Logged-in users see bookings & if want can cancel the booking.
The technology used: React, react-bootstrap, firebase, react-router, node, express, MongoDB, etc & packages such as Axios, react hook form, react router hash link etc.

title: Medicare
features: Created a SPA medical care website where users can see many types of medical services. To get an appointment for specific services, users must logged-in.
Implement an authentication system with email/ password and google sign-in. To log in with an email/ password, users must sign up first.
The technology used: React, react-bootstrap, firebase, react-router etc.
